trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> for media content.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>为媒体内容。

trans-unit.source: MediaTimeline is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> object which provides control over media timing in the same way that animation timeline objects control animations.
trans-unit.target: MediaTimeline 是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>对象可控制媒体计时动画时间线对象控制动画的方式相同。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: For example, a MediaTimeline has associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> properties can be used to specify when media begins and how long it plays.
trans-unit.target: 例如，关联 MediaTimeline<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>属性可以用于指定媒体的开始位置和它充当多长时间。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [Animation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information on animation timelines.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[动画概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关动画时间线详细信息。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to associate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> using a MediaTimeline.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法将关联<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>使用 MediaTimeline。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: Inside of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, when a MediaTimeline is targets a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> will be created and assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>’s associated player.
trans-unit.target: 内<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，这时 MediaTimeline 位于目标<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock>将创建并分配给<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>的关联的播放器。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a MediaElement by Using a Storyboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example; 2.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[如何︰ 通过使用情节提要控制 MediaElement](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)例如; 2。

trans-unit.source: By explicitly creating a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock> from a MediaTimeline and assigning it to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 通过<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock>从 MediaTimeline 和将其分配给一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement></xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock>显式创建

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of the MediaTimeline is set to `Automatic` (default), the duration of MediaTimeline is the natural duration of the media source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>MediaTimeline 设置为`Automatic`（默认值）、 MediaTimeline 的持续时间是媒体源的自然持续时间。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: To find the natural duration of the media source programmatically, query the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.NaturalDuration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式查找的媒体源的自然持续时间，查询<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.NaturalDuration%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.NaturalDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> that begins at the specified time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>用于在指定时间开始。

trans-unit.source: The time to begin the timeline.
trans-unit.target: 开始时间线的时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> class using the supplied Uri as the media source.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>类作为媒体源使用提供的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The media source for the timeline.
trans-unit.target: 用于时间线的媒体源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> that begins at the specified time and lasts for the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref> ，匹配位置始于指定的时间和持续指定的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The time to begin media playback.
trans-unit.target: 开始播放媒体的时间。

trans-unit.source: The length of time for media playback.
trans-unit.target: 播放媒体的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> class that begins at the specified time over the specified time and has the specified repeat behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>类，该类在指定时间段指定时间开始并具有指定的重复行为。

trans-unit.source: The time to begin media playback.
trans-unit.target: 开始播放媒体的时间。

trans-unit.source: The length of time for media playback.
trans-unit.target: 播放媒体的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: The repeat behavior to use when the playback duration has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的播放持续时间已达到时的重复行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaClock"></xref> for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaClock"></xref>此时间线。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaClock"></xref> for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaClock"></xref>此时间线。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定的深层副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref>克隆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.

trans-unit.target: 创建 MediaTimeline 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance of MediaTimeline unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 使 MediaTimeline 此实例成为不可修改，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to check if the timeline can be frozen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to freeze the timeline.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要检查是否可以冻结时间线;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>冻结时间线。

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is , this method returns if this can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 如果 isChecking 是 ，此方法返回如果此可变为不可修改，或如果不能将其变为不可修改。

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is , this method returns if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having made the actual change in frozen status to this object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 isChecking 是 ，此方法返回如果指定现在是不可修改，或如果它不能成为不可修改，带副作用的实际更改处于冻结状态对此对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>
